remarks: Re-index a finite group sum as map, using a bijection.  (Contributed by by AV, 23-Jul-2019.)
statement:
gsummptcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsummptcl.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsummptcl.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
gsummptcl.e $e |- ( ph -> A. i e. N X e. B ) $.
gsummptfif1o.f $e |- F = ( i e. N |-> X ) $.
gsummptfif1o.h $e |- ( ph -> H : C -1-1-onto-> N ) $.
gsummptfif1o $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( G gsum ( F o. H ) ) ) $.
$d B i $.
$d N i $.
